gobblin.data.management.copy.hive

Class HiveCopyEntityHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.data.management.copy.hive.HiveCopyEntityHelper

  • public class HiveCopyEntityHelper
extends Object
    Creates CopyEntitys for copying a Hive table.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  HiveCopyEntityHelper.DeregisterFileDeleteMethod 
      protected static class  HiveCopyEntityHelper.DiffPathSet
      A container for the differences between desired and existing files.
      static class  HiveCopyEntityHelper.ExistingEntityPolicy
      Defines what should be done for partitions that exist in the target but are not compatible with the source.
      static class  HiveCopyEntityHelper.Stages 
      static class  HiveCopyEntityHelper.UnmanagedDataPolicy
      Defines what should be done for data that is not managed by the existing target table / partition.

      • COPY_PARTITION_FILTER_GENERATOR

        public static final String COPY_PARTITION_FILTER_GENERATOR
        Use an implementation of PartitionFilterGenerator to dynamically create partition filter. The value should be the name of the implementation to use.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • FAST_PARTITION_SKIP_PREDICATE

        public static final String FAST_PARTITION_SKIP_PREDICATE
        A predicate applied to each partition before any file listing. If the predicate returns true, the partition will be skipped.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • FAST_TABLE_SKIP_PREDICATE

        public static final String FAST_TABLE_SKIP_PREDICATE
        A predicate applied to non partition table before any file listing. If the predicate returns true, the table will be skipped.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DELETE_FILES_ON_DEREGISTER

        public static final String DELETE_FILES_ON_DEREGISTER
        Method for deleting files on deregister. One of HiveCopyEntityHelper.DeregisterFileDeleteMethod.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_DEREGISTER_DELETE_METHOD

      • HIVE_PARTITION_EXTENDED_FILTER_TYPE

        public static final String HIVE_PARTITION_EXTENDED_FILTER_TYPE
        Config key to specify if IMetaStoreClient's filtering method listPartitionsByFilter is not enough for filtering out specific partitions. For example, if you specify "Path" as the filter type and "Hourly" as the filtering condition, partitions with Path containing '/Hourly/' will be kept.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        public static final String GOBBLIN_DISTCP
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • addTableDeregisterSteps

        protected int addTableDeregisterSteps(List<CopyEntity> copyEntities,
                                      String fileSet,
                                      int initialPriority,
                                      Table table)
                               throws IOException
        Throws:
        IOException

      • fullPathDiff

        protected static HiveCopyEntityHelper.DiffPathSet fullPathDiff(HiveLocationDescriptor sourceLocation,
                                                               HiveLocationDescriptor desiredTargetLocation,
                                                               Optional<HiveLocationDescriptor> currentTargetLocation,
                                                               Optional<Partition> partition,
                                                               MultiTimingEvent multiTimer,
                                                               HiveCopyEntityHelper helper)
                                                        throws IOException
        Compares three entities to figure out which files should be copied and which files should be deleted in the target file system.
        Parameters:
        sourceLocation - Represents the source table or partition.
        desiredTargetLocation - Represents the new desired table or partition.
        currentTargetLocation - Represents the corresponding existing table or partition in the target hcat if it exists.
        partition - If present, contains partition information.
        Returns:
        A HiveCopyEntityHelper.DiffPathSet with data on files to copy and delete.
        Throws:
        IOException - if the copy of this table / partition should be aborted.

      • replacedPrefix

        protected static Path replacedPrefix(Path sourcePath,

                                     Path prefixReplacement)

        public FileSystem getTargetFileSystem()
